column4: pessimist: when i am a non-priveledged user i try to run a sudo command, the part after sudo (such as "sudo aptit...") does not tab-complete
so i have to sudo bash to get elevated privs
actionparsnip: i do not have a .bashrc for my user
that is very doubtful. unless you deleted it on purpose
actually i did can my old profile, i thought on logon it would recreate a skeleton config? i will restore this file from backup
and ActionParsnip: thanks for the help! it was because i deleted my .bashrc when recreating my profile for 11.10 - after restoring this file from backup the issue is resolved!
